name: Flower Link Puzzle - Pop & Smash Match Game
name_original: Flower Link Puzzle - Pop & Smash Match Game
description:
This game is a very addictive game with fresh gameplay!
How to play:
1. Connect three or more same flowers splash to score points.
2. Complete the mission to level up.
3. Eliminate the more flowers line quickly can get extra scores.
Feature:
1. More than 80 challenging levels & many game props.
2. Sweet and delicious UI & cool animation effects.
3. Play the game and Have Fun!!!
